about.heading: About Me
about.subheading: Transforming Quality Assurance with AI & Automation
about.bio: Senior QA Automation Engineer with 10+ years of expertise in SDET roles across diverse domains including Oracle Cloud, Airlines, HR & Legal, Healthcare, and Logistics. Specialized in designing enterprise-grade automation frameworks using Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, and REST Assured. Pioneering the integration of AI agents and LLMs in testing workflows to enhance efficiency and coverage. Proven track record of reducing regression time by 70%, achieving 85% automation coverage, and delivering complex test solutions for microservices architectures. Active thought leader with 2000+ LinkedIn followers, publishing insights on AI agents, generative AI in testing, and modern QA practices.

projects.heading: Key Projects & Achievements
projects.subheading: Transforming quality through innovation and automation

projects.title: Oracle Hospitality Reporting & Analytics - Cloud QA
projects.problem: Complex cloud-based hospitality system consolidating POS data from multiple sources required comprehensive test automation across microservices, APIs, and UI layers with zero downtime deployments.
projects.solution: Architected multi-framework automation solution supporting functional, integration, and E2E testing. Implemented TestContainers for isolated microservices testing, REST Assured for API validation, and parallel execution across Playwright, Selenium, and Cypress for UI testing. Established QA sign-off process ensuring release quality.
projects.impact: 70% reduction in regression time, 100% automation coverage for critical paths, zero production defects in 15+ releases

projects.title: United Airlines Enterprise Testing Framework
projects.problem: United Airlines' complex route network and booking systems required enterprise-scale automation framework handling domestic and international operations with high test coverage and maintainability.
projects.solution: Developed comprehensive REST API framework using Java, REST Assured, and Cucumber BDD. Created Karate DSL framework for E2E API testing and integration testing. Built Selenium-based UI framework for core modules. Integrated all frameworks into TeamCity CI/CD pipeline for continuous testing.
projects.impact: 85% automation coverage, 30 hours saved per release cycle, 80% tool adoption rate from client POCs

projects.title: I-9 & E-Verify Compliance Automation
projects.problem: U.S. employment verification system (I-9 and E-Verify) required regulatory compliance testing with complex SSO integrations, multiple endpoints, and strict accuracy requirements for identity verification.
projects.solution: Built BDD-style automation framework using Specflow with C# for scenario-driven testing. Extensively tested REST API services and SSO integrations using Postman. Validated data integrity across E-Verify endpoints. Implemented Jenkins CI/CD for automated execution and reporting with Extent Reports.
projects.impact: 100% regulatory compliance maintained, automated validation of all verification endpoints, reduced manual testing by 60%

projects.title: FedEx ePAT - Enterprise Pricing Platform
projects.problem: FedEx Enterprise Pricing Analyst Toolkit spanning six operating companies needed comprehensive testing for profit/loss calculations, pricing strategies, and agreement generation with complex business rules.
projects.solution: Executed functional and regression testing across multi-tier client/server architecture. Developed automation scripts using Selenium WebDriver with Java. Performed extensive SQL database validation for pricing calculations. Managed test documentation and traceability matrices ensuring requirement coverage.
projects.impact: Comprehensive test coverage across 6 operating companies, zero calculation errors in production, streamlined pricing proposal workflow

projects.title: LinkedIn Job Scraper & Report Generator
projects.problem: Manual job search and tracking on LinkedIn was time-consuming, requiring a solution to automatically aggregate job listings and generate structured reports for analysis.
projects.solution: Developed Python-based web scraping tool that extracts job listings based on role keywords from LinkedIn. Implemented automated PDF report generation with structured job data including company, location, requirements, and application links. Created reusable utilities for JSON, TXT, and XLSX file handling.
projects.impact: Automated job discovery and reporting, reduced manual search time by 80%, gained 1 GitHub star for community utility
